Class TextRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nfcforandroid.records.AbstractRecord
      • com.github.nfcforandroid.records.ndef.wkt.TextRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INfaRecord, INdefRecord

    public final class TextRecord
extends AbstractRecord
implements INdefRecord
    Author:
    jefBinomed INfaRecord for text data. This class contains a text, an encoding and a locale
